Name: Black Forest Sour
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into ice-filled glass.
Review: Beautifully balanced with complex herbal, berry, pineapple and citrus flavours.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Forest Sour contains 166 calories
